questions.question: An organization is using SageMaker to train and deploy a reinforcement learning (RL) model that optimizes a portfolio of financial assets. Which of the following features of SageMaker RL would benefit their use case? (Select Two)
options: SageMaker supports pre-built RL toolkits like Intel Coach and Ray RLlib for state-of-the-art algorithms.
SageMaker allows monitoring and adjusting the training through Python SDK integration.
The RL model must always be deployed on real-world environments; simulated environments are not supported.
Training jobs can only run on external instances and not locally on notebook instances.
correct_answers: SageMaker supports pre-built RL toolkits like Intel Coach and Ray RLlib for state-of-the-art algorithms.
SageMaker allows monitoring and adjusting the training through Python SDK integration.
questions.topic: Deployment and Orchestration of ML Workflows
